handNote.p: Main hand. An 'Exeter' type hand, probably identical with a hand in Cleop. B.xiii. Three forms of s used, double s sometimes written long s followed by low s; þonne is abbreviated after double n;
Reviser.s. xi2Glosses and potentially expungates early in the text.
